translation.en: Wow!
translation.ja: NETFLIX シリーズ

translation.en: - ♪ Big Tree City Rescue, let's go! ♪ - ♪ Hey! ♪
translation.ja: ビッグツリー･シティー レスキュー いくぞ！

translation.en: ♪ Big Tree City ♪
translation.ja: ビッグツリー･シティ

translation.en: - ♪ Big Tree City Rescue, let's go! ♪ - ♪ Hey! ♪
translation.ja: ビッグツリー･シティ･ レスキュー レッツゴー！

translation.en: ♪ Big Tree City ♪
translation.ja: ビッグツリー･シティ

translation.en: - ♪ Big Tree City Rescue, let's go! ♪ - ♪ Hey! ♪
translation.ja: ビッグツリー･シティ･ レスキュー レッツゴー！

translation.en: ♪ Let's go! ♪
translation.ja: レッツゴー！

translation.en: - - That's fantastic!
translation.ja: すごいぞ！

translation.en: Smiling faces, colorful balloons, and smooth- talking news anchors.
translation.ja: 笑顔(えがお)にカラフルな風船(ふうせん)に トークのうまいキャスター

translation.en: It's a windy day for the annual Big Tree City balloon parade,
translation.ja: ビッグツリー･シティの 風船(ふうせん)パレードの日(ひ)です

translation.en: famous for its huge balloons.
translation.ja: 巨大(きょだい)な風船(ふうせん)が

translation.en: A marvelous occasion concluding at the glorious Horatio Bear Monument.
translation.ja: 輝(かがや)かしいホレイショ記念像(きねんぞう)を 目(め)ざします

translation.en: Parade day!
translation.ja: パレードだ！

translation.en: Balloons! Barade palloons!
translation.ja: 風船(ふうせん)！ パレードの風船(ふうせん)！

translation.en: Oh, I always wanted to see the famous parade balloons!
translation.ja: ずっと見(み)たかったんだ

translation.en: It's my first time!
translation.ja: ついに見(み)られる

translation.en: Shall we go, then?
translation.ja: じゃあ 行(い)くか？

translation.en: Yes. It's going to be amazing!
translation.ja: 行(い)こう　きっとすごいよ

translation.en: Ah! It sure is.
translation.ja: そうだな

translation.en: It's gonna be great. Isn't it, Splash?
translation.ja: たのしみだな　スプラッシュ

translation.en: Yeah. I can't wait!
translation.ja: まちきれないよ

translation.en: Me too. It's gonna be fantastic.
translation.ja: わたしもだ　すばらしいぞ

translation.en: A real doozy.
translation.ja: 最高(さいこう)だ

translation.en: A real doozy?
translation.ja: 最高(さいこう)？

translation.en: Just you and me.
translation.ja: キミとわたしで

translation.en: Plumbing.
translation.ja: 配管(はいかん)する

translation.en: Plumbing?
translation.ja: 配管(はいかん)？

translation.en: Plumbing.
translation.ja: 配管(はいかん)だ

translation.en: See? This means it's Bonding Day with Splash.
translation.ja: 見(み)ろ　スプラッシュと 絆(きずな)を深(ふか)める日(ひ)だ

translation.en: You are gonna teach me all about plumbing, right here in HQ.
translation.ja: 本部(ほんぶ)の配管(はいかん)について 教(おし)えてくれ

translation.en: - And we'll bond.  - Ah.
translation.ja: 絆(きずな)が深(ふか)まるぞ

translation.en: Hey, Major, I was thinking, with the parade happening and everything,
translation.ja: 隊長(たいちょう)　 せっかくパレードを やってるんだし

translation.en: maybe we could delay Bonding Day.
translation.ja: 絆(きずな)の日(ひ)を延期(えんき)するのは？

translation.en: - - Uh, one moment, Splash.
translation.ja: おまちを

translation.en: Big Tree City Rescue, ready to rescue you.
translation.ja: ビッグツリー･シティー･ レスキューです

translation.en: Oh no. Team, to the briefing room.
translation.ja: たいへんだ 作戦(さくせん)ルームへ！

translation.en: Listen up, team.
translation.ja: よく聞(き)け

translation.en: Mr. Pig has got himself stuck in a bin on the parade path.
translation.ja: ミスター･ピッグが ごみ箱(ばこ)に はまった

translation.en: If we don't help him, it could ruin the parade.
translation.ja: たすけないと パレードが台(だい)なしだ

translation.en: - - And the beloved balloons.
translation.ja: みんなが大(だい)すきな風船(ふうせん)も

translation.en: Pecky, Flame, Stripes, get him out of there without disrupting the parade.
translation.ja: ペッキー　フレイム ストライプス ミスター･ピッグを救出(きゅうしゅつ)せよ

translation.en: Move out!
translation.ja: 出動(しゅつどう)！

translation.en: Splash, I have a very special high- priority job for you.
translation.ja: スプラッシュ　キミに 特別(とくべつ)で重要(じゅうよう)な仕事(しごと)がある

translation.en: - Teach me to plumb. -
translation.ja: 配管(はいかん)を教(おし)えろ

translation.en: Right. So, I'm going to demonstrate the basics of plumbing
translation.ja: それじゃ― こわれたディスペンサーを 使(つか)って配管(はいかん)の基本(きほん)を教(おし)えるよ

translation.en: with this broken soap dispenser.
translation.ja: こわれたディスペンサーを 使(つか)って配管(はいかん)の基本(きほん)を教(おし)えるよ

translation.en: Doesn't look broken.
translation.ja: こわれてるか？

translation.en: - - Oh! Sorry, Splash.
translation.ja: おっと　ごめん

translation.en: Hmm. Looks like fixing this will take all day.
translation.ja: なおすのに 丸一日(まるいちにち)かかりそうだ

translation.en: Well, if we fix it before the parade finishes,
translation.ja: パレードがおわるまえに なおせば見(み)られるよ

translation.en: we can still see the…  …balloons.
translation.ja: パレードがおわるまえに なおせば見(み)られるよ 風船(ふうせん)を

translation.en: - The parade is closing in! - We need to get Mr. Pig out of that bin.
translation.ja: パレードが近(ちか)づいてる ミスター･ピッグを たすけないと

translation.en: Over here!
translation.ja: こっちだよ

translation.en: Help me!
translation.ja: たすけて！

translation.en: Okay. Go over it again, Mr. Pig.
translation.ja: もういちど聞(き)かせろ

translation.en: How exactly did you get stuck in a bin?
translation.ja: どうして ごみ箱(ばこ)に はまった？

translation.en: Well, I bought some potatoes to eat while watching the parade,
translation.ja: パレードを見(み)るために ポテトを買(か)ったら…

translation.en: and, well, you know, things got a bit out of hand.
translation.ja: パレードを見(み)るために ポテトを買(か)ったら… こんなことに

translation.en: How long's this going to take? I mean, I can't see the parade.
translation.ja: どのくらいかかる？ パレードが見(み)えない

translation.en: - I can't get him out. - Stand clear!
translation.ja: だせない どいて！

translation.en: We need maximum power!
translation.ja: いくよ　マキシム･パワー！

translation.en: I'll be gentle.
translation.ja: やさしくね

translation.en: - Come on! -
translation.ja: いけ！

translation.en: Come on!
translation.ja: いけ！

translation.en: Did it work?
translation.ja: 成功(せいこう)した？

translation.en: Major, Mr. Pig is stuck in a bin stuck in a crater.
translation.ja: 隊長(たいちょう)　ミスター･ピッグが クレーターにはまった

translation.en: - What do we do? - Come again?
translation.ja: どうする？ なんて？

translation.en: Mr. Pig is now in a crater in the middle of the road.
translation.ja: 道(みち)の真(ま)ん中(なか)に クレーターができて

translation.en: If we don't do something, we'll have to cancel the parade.
translation.ja: このままだと パレードが中止(ちゅうし)に

translation.en: - You better take a look. The balloons-- - Balloons! No, no, no!
translation.ja: 隊長(たいちょう)　風船(ふうせん)を見(み)て… ナシ！

translation.en: No problem.  I don't need to see the balloons.
translation.ja: 心配(しんぱい)ナシ 風船(ふうせん)は見(み)なくていい

translation.en: I'll simply reroute the parade down another road.
translation.ja: パレードのルートを変更(へんこう)する

translation.en: Oh, Major.
translation.ja: 隊長(たいちょう)

translation.en: What if we reroute the parade to go past HQ?
translation.ja: 本部(ほんぶ)の前(まえ)を 通(とお)るようにしては？

translation.en: Then we can do Bonding Day and see the parade.
translation.ja: そうすれば パレードが見(み)られるよ

translation.en: Bring the massive balloons here?
translation.ja: 巨大風船(きょだいふうせん)をここに？

translation.en: My, my, what a creative idea.
translation.ja: それは なんと 独創的(どくそうてき)なアイデアだ

translation.en: Yes, I'll do that right away.
translation.ja: そうしよう

translation.en: This route will completely avoid headquarters.
translation.ja: このルートなら 本部(ほんぶ)をさけられるぞ

translation.en: The parade must not come past HQ.
translation.ja: 本部(ほんぶ)の前(まえ)を通(とお)ってはダメだ

translation.en: Never!
translation.ja: ぜったいに

translation.en: Right past HQ?
translation.ja: 本部(ほんぶ)の目(め)の前(まえ)？

translation.en: Right past HQ.
translation.ja: そう　本部(ほんぶ)の目(め)の前(まえ)だ

translation.en: There. Nowhere near HQ. Mm- hmm.
translation.ja: よし 本部(ほんぶ)には近(ちか)づけない

translation.en: Stripes, I'm sending you the new route now.
translation.ja: ストライプス 新(あたら)しいルートを送(おく)る

translation.en: Major, is this correct?
translation.ja: これで合(あ)ってる？

translation.en: Yes. Totally correct.
translation.ja: 完全(かんぜん)に合(あ)ってる

translation.en: Even though it goes over Windy Bridge, the bridge notorious for being extremely windy and terribly unsafe?
translation.ja: 風(かぜ)が強(つよ)くて危険(きけん)な ウィンディ橋(ばし)を通(とお)るのに？

translation.en: Yep.
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: The parade has been rerouted. Follow me.
translation.ja: ルート変更(へんこう)だ　ついてきて

translation.en: Hmm. Much as I suspected.
translation.ja: やっぱりだ

translation.en: Major, we have a problem.
translation.ja: 隊長(たいちょう)　問題(もんだい)が

translation.en: - The wind on Windy Bridge is too windy. -
translation.ja: ウィンディ橋(ばし)の風(かぜ)が強(つよ)すぎて

translation.en: The balloons are lifting people into the air.
translation.ja: 風船(ふうせん)がみんなをもちあげてる

translation.en: Oh no! Secure the balloons to the bridge and get the civilians out of there.
translation.ja: マズい 風船(ふうせん)を橋(はし)に固定(こてい)し みんなをにがせ

translation.en: Yes.
translation.ja: はい　隊長(たいちょう)

translation.en: Please make your way off the bridge. Please make your way off the bridge.
translation.ja: 橋(はし)から おりてください 橋(はし)から おりてください

translation.en: Chaotic scenes as Big Tree City Rescue prevent the parade from blowing away.
translation.ja: ビッグツリー･シティ･ レスキューが パレードを守(まも)ろうとしてます

translation.en: - Major? -
translation.ja: 隊長(たいちょう)

translation.en: Windy Bridge leads away from HQ.
translation.ja: ウィンディ橋(ばし)は 本部(ほんぶ)と逆方向(ぎゃくほうこう)だ

translation.en: Ooh, uh, Splash, I didn't want the parade to go past HQ.
translation.ja: パレードに本部(ほんぶ)の前(まえ)を 通(とお)ってほしくなくて

translation.en: So I rerouted it in completely the opposite direction.
translation.ja: ルートを逆方向(ぎゃくほうこう)に 変更(へんこう)したんだ

translation.en: But why?
translation.ja: どうして？

translation.en: I have a phobia.
translation.ja: 恐怖症(きょうふしょう)なんだ

translation.en: - Of wind? - No, of balloons.
translation.ja: 風(かぜ)の？ ちがう　風船(ふうせん)のだよ

translation.en: - Ooh, I'm petrified of 'em. - But balloons are great.
translation.ja: おそろしくて 風船(ふうせん)は楽(たの)しいし わると大(おお)きな音(おと)がするのに

translation.en: They're bouncy and funny, and when you pop them, they go bang!
translation.ja: 風船(ふうせん)は楽(たの)しいし わると大(おお)きな音(おと)がするのに

translation.en: Exactly. The way they wobble about, floating like ghosts.
translation.ja: そのとおり ヤツらは ゆうれいみたいに うかび音(おと)を立(た)ててわれる

translation.en: But it’s the popping I dread the most.
translation.ja: ヤツらは ゆうれいみたいに うかび音(おと)を立(た)ててわれる

translation.en: And the Big Tree City balloons are the biggest balloons you’ve ever seen.
translation.ja: それにビッグツリー･ シティの風船(ふうせん)は巨大(きょだい)だ

translation.en: I've never seen the balloons before.
translation.ja: いちども見(み)たことないのに

translation.en: What? Really?
translation.ja: 本当(ほんとう)か？

translation.en: I've always wanted to see the Big Tree City Parade, ever since I was a tadpole.
translation.ja: オタマジャクシのころから パレードが見(み)たかったんだ

translation.en: But I forgot about Bonding Day, and I don't wanna let you down.
translation.ja: でも隊長(たいちょう)を ガッカリさせたくなかった

translation.en: I'm the one who let you down, Splash.
translation.ja: ガッカリさせたのは わたしだ

translation.en: I used Bonding Day as an excuse to avoid the balloons,
translation.ja: 絆(きずな)の日(ひ)を使(つか)って 風船(ふうせん)をさけた

translation.en: and in doing so, ruined Parade Day for you.
translation.ja: そのせいでキミの パレードの日(ひ)を台(だい)なしに

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.ja: わるかった

translation.en: Ah, don't worry. I'll see the parade next year.
translation.ja: 気(き)にしないで 来年(らいねん) 見(み)ればいいよ

translation.en: Besides, the balloons aren't going anywhere.
translation.ja: 風船(ふうせん)はどこにもいかないしね

translation.en: - The balloons are going somewhere. - No!
translation.ja: 風船(ふうせん)がどこかへ たいへん！

translation.en: - Oh no! - The bridge!
translation.ja: 橋(はし)が！

translation.en: Major, the bridge is airborne.
translation.ja: 隊長(たいちょう)　橋(はし)が飛行中(ひこうちゅう)だ

translation.en: Ah! Hold tight. Prickles is on the case.
translation.ja: プリックルスが対処中(たいしょちゅう)だ

translation.en: I'll come up with a plan. Oh, plan, plan. Need a plan.
translation.ja: 計画(けいかく)を考(かんが)える 計画(けいかく)　計画(けいかく)…

translation.en: Oh, I can't think straight when there are balloons involved.
translation.ja: 風船(ふうせん)のせいで考(かんが)えられない

translation.en: I've got a plan.
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: Amazing.
translation.ja: すごい

translation.en: Ah, look, you can see the Horatio Square Monument from here.
translation.ja: 見(み)ろ　ホレイショ広場(ひろば)の 記念像(きねんぞう)だ

translation.en: - - Oh no! We're headed straight for it!
translation.ja: たいへん　ぶつかる！

translation.en: How are we gonna stop this bridge?
translation.ja: どうやって止(と)めれば？

translation.en: Don't worry, everyone. We're here.
translation.ja: 心配(しんぱい)するな わたしたちがいる

translation.en: Oh, this is most undignified.
translation.ja: なんて なさけない姿(すがた)だ

translation.en: They're everything I imagined.
translation.ja: ぼくの想像(そうぞう)どおりだ

translation.en: No! They're everything I imagined!
translation.ja: ちがう わたしの想像(そうぞう)どおりだ

translation.en: Right. Seen 'em now. Let's get this bridge back on the ground
translation.ja: よし　見(み)た 記念像(きねんぞう)にぶつかる前(まえ)に 橋(はし)をおろそう

translation.en: before it crashes into Horatio Bear Monument. For Bonding Day!
translation.ja: 記念像(きねんぞう)にぶつかる前(まえ)に 橋(はし)をおろそう 絆(きずな)の日(ひ)に！

translation.en: For Bonding Day!
translation.ja: 絆(きずな)の日(ひ)に！

translation.en: Oo- wee!
translation.ja: まてよ

translation.en: Goodness, I just popped a balloon and it was fun.
translation.ja: 風船(ふうせん)をわったら楽(たの)しかったぞ

translation.en: See? Balloons are fun!
translation.ja: 風船(ふうせん)は楽(たの)しいでしょ？

translation.en: Balloons are fun!
translation.ja: 風船(ふうせん)は楽(たの)しい

translation.en: This is for all those birthday parties I could've gone to. Hi- ya!
translation.ja: 今(いま)まで のがしてきた 誕生日(たんじょうび)パーティーのぶんだ

translation.en: They're using Major Prickles's spiky bum as a weapon!
translation.ja: プリックルス隊長(たいちょう)の おしりを武器(ぶき)にしてる！

translation.en: This is for all those hot- air balloon rides I missed out on.
translation.ja: 今(いま)まで のれなかった 熱気球(ねつききゅう)のぶんだ

translation.en: - Quick, Major! We're running out of time! - I'm on it.
translation.ja: 隊長(たいちょう)　時間(じかん)がない！ まかせろ

translation.en: - - One more!
translation.ja: もういちど！

translation.en: And this is for the time my sister got married in that balloon factory.
translation.ja: これは姉(ねえ)さんが風船工場(ふうせんこうじょう)で 結婚(けっこん)したときのぶんだ

translation.en: You did it, Major!
translation.ja: さすが隊長(たいちょう)！

translation.en: All thanks to you, Splash. Bonding Day complete.
translation.ja: スプラッシュのおかげだ 絆(きずな)の日(ひ) 完了(かんりょう)！

translation.en: The Big Tree City Parade's latest addition of a screaming, flying hedgehog is a hit.
translation.ja: ビッグツリー･シティ･ パレードのハリネズミが 大(だい)ヒット

translation.en: We look forward to seeing it next year. I'm Ted Lister.
translation.ja: 来年(らいねん)も楽(たの)しみです テッド･リスターでした

translation.en: Exercise!
translation.ja: エクササイズ！

translation.en: It's the most important meal of the day.
translation.ja: いちばん大事(だいじ)な食事(しょくじ)だ

translation.en: And I eat exercise for breakfast.
translation.ja: 朝食(ちょうしょく)にエクササイズ

translation.en: But it's a meal I must eat on my own.
translation.ja: だが ひとりでする食事(しょくじ)だ

translation.en: If only I could exercise with the team. But I must do it in secret.
translation.ja: みんなで やりたいけど かくれてやらないと

translation.en: No one must ever see… the sweating!
translation.ja: わたしの汗(あせ)は だれも見(み)てはいけない

translation.en: What are you doing, Major? You gonna exercise with us?
translation.ja: なにしてるの　隊長(たいちょう) いっしょに エクササイズする？

translation.en: Oh! Oh, uh, wait, I…
translation.ja: まってくれ　わたしは…

translation.en: Let's get a sweat on!
translation.ja: 汗(あせ)をかこう！

translation.en: Sweat? No! There's no need to sweat.
translation.ja: 汗(あせ)？　とんでもない

translation.en: Who's sweating? Definitely not me.
translation.ja: わたしは汗(あせ)はかかない

translation.en: We've never worked out together. I'll join you!
translation.ja: いっしょに運動(うんどう)しましょうよ

translation.en: No, no. No need. No need.
translation.ja: いや　必要(ひつよう)ない

translation.en: - I usually work out solo. Oh. -
translation.ja: いつも ひとりだ

translation.en: Wanna lift some weights with me, Major? Really makes you…
translation.ja: ウェイトをやらない？ すごく いい汗(あせ)をかけるよ

translation.en: …sweaty.
translation.ja: すごく いい汗(あせ)をかけるよ

translation.en: Oh, no, thanks, Pecky. Ooh!
translation.ja: 結構(けっこう)だ　ペッキー

translation.en: Check it out, Major. This bike powers a smoothie maker.
translation.ja: 見(み)て　バイクで スムージーをつくるよ

translation.en: The more you pedal, the more power it generates.
translation.ja: こげばこぐほど 電気(でんき)がうまれる

translation.en: It's great for building up a sweat. Wanna have a go, Major?
translation.ja: 汗(あせ)をかくのにピッタリ やってみる？

translation.en: - Ah! I can't. No. - Why not?
translation.ja: ムリだ なぜ？

translation.en: - Uh, the telephone might ring. - Are you avoiding exercise, Major?
translation.ja: 電話(でんわ)がなるかも エクササイズをさけてる？

translation.en: What? That's… Why would I…
translation.ja: まさか どうして…

translation.en: Oh, I mean, don't be silly.
translation.ja: いや… そんなバカな

translation.en: - - Oh, telephone!
translation.ja: 電話(でんわ)だ！

translation.en: Thank goodness, an emergency.
translation.ja: よかった　緊急(きんきゅう)じたいだ

translation.en: Big Tree Exercise, how can I sweat you?
translation.ja: ビッグツリー･ エクササイズです

translation.en: Really? Oh no. Team, to the briefing room.
translation.ja: それは たいへん 作戦(さくせん)ルームへ！

translation.en: What's gotten into him?
translation.ja: どうしちゃったの？

translation.en: There's been a power cut at the Big Tree City Music Stadium.
translation.ja: ビッグツリー･シティ･ スタジアムで停電(ていでん)だ

translation.en: And the famous pop star Lil JJ is performing a concert there tonight.
translation.ja: 今夜(こんや)リル･ＪＪが コンサートをする予定(よてい)だ

translation.en: Not Lil JJ!
translation.ja: リル･ＪＪ！

translation.en: The best pop star ever! I'm her biggest fan.
translation.ja: 最高(さいこう)の歌手(かしゅ)だよ 大(だい)ファンなんだ

translation.en: Excuse me. I'm her biggest fan. Have you even heard her new hit single?
translation.ja: 大(だい)ファンなのはわたしよ 最新曲(さいしんきょく)をきいた？

translation.en: Yes, I have. And did you know that she's playing it at tonight's concert?
translation.ja: 当然(とうぜん)だ 今夜(こんや)コンサートがあると しってた？

translation.en: Unless we fix the power at the stadium, there won't be a concert.
translation.ja: 電気(でんき)をなおさないかぎり コンサートはない

translation.en: No power, no lights, no sound.
translation.ja: 電気(でんき)も照明(しょうめい)も音(おと)も―

translation.en: And no Lil JJ.
translation.ja: リル･ＪＪもナシ

translation.en: - No! - No!
translation.ja: ウソ！

translation.en: This is top priority. Kit and I will head over
translation.ja: 重要(じゅうよう)ミッションだ キットとわたしは 発電所(はつでんしょ)をチェックし

translation.en: to the power station and see if we can fix the problem.
translation.ja: キットとわたしは 発電所(はつでんしょ)をチェックし

translation.en: Meanwhile, Flame and Tricks take a backup power generator
translation.ja: フレイムとトリックスは 予備(よび)の発電機(はつでんき)を

translation.en: to the stadium in case anything goes wrong.
translation.ja: スタジアムへもっていく

translation.en: - Yes, Major. - Move out!
translation.ja: はい　隊長(たいちょう) 出動(しゅつどう)！

translation.en: Connections connected.
translation.ja: つながった

translation.en: It's amazing to think that Lil JJ's concert
translation.ja: ぼくの発電機(はつでんき)で リル･ＪＪのコンサートに

translation.en: might be powered by my generator. Huh?
translation.ja: 電気(でんき)をおくれるなんて

translation.en: But it'll only be running thanks to me starting it.
translation.ja: わたしがスタートしなきゃ 動(うご)かないけどね

translation.en: - Oh no! Tricks, fix it! - What are we gonna do?
translation.ja: たいへん！ トリックス コンサートが 始(はじ)まっちゃうよ

translation.en: The concert starts soon!
translation.ja: コンサートが 始(はじ)まっちゃうよ

translation.en: It's Lil JJ.
translation.ja: リル･ＪＪ！

translation.en: She's amazing.
translation.ja: すごいオーラだ

translation.en: We should say hi.
translation.ja: あいさつを

translation.en: Yeah, but be cool.
translation.ja: おちつけ

translation.en: It's you! It's really you! Hi, hello. Welcome.
translation.ja: 本物(ほんもの)だ！ フリックスとトレイムです

translation.en: I'm Flicks. This is Trame.
translation.ja: フリックスとトレイムです

translation.en: Hello. Hi, how are you? Sorry to bother you. We're just… Wowzers!
translation.ja: はじめまして わたしたち あなたの…

translation.en: - I'm your biggest fan! - Is that so?
translation.ja: 大(だい)ファンです そうなの？　ありがとう

translation.en: Aren't you the sweetest?
translation.ja: そうなの？　ありがとう

translation.en: Wanna come backstage?
translation.ja: 楽屋(がくや)にくる？

translation.en: Yes, please!
translation.ja: ぜひ

translation.en: Like I was saying, I'm your biggest fan.
translation.ja: いちばんのファンなんです

translation.en: Uh, second biggest. I'm your biggest fan.
translation.ja: にばんだろ いちばんは ぼく

translation.en: Well, I'm really bigger than you, so I guess I'm the biggest fan.
translation.ja: でも わたしのほうが ビッグなファンだし…

translation.en: Okay, Major. Looks like we can get the stadium's power back on
translation.ja: 隊長(たいちょう) そのスイッチをひけば 電気(でんき)がもどるみたい

translation.en: with a simple pull of that switch.
translation.ja: そのスイッチをひけば 電気(でんき)がもどるみたい

translation.en: Oh, good. Just a pull of a switch and off we go.
translation.ja: そうか　スイッチを ひっぱるだけか

translation.en: Oh! Had I known we were exercising, I would've worn a sweatband.
translation.ja: 汗止(あせど)めバンドを もってくればよかった

translation.en: Hmm. Not quite as straightforward as I was expecting, but this shouldn't be too difficult. I just need to…
translation.ja: そんなにむずかしくは ないはずだけど…

translation.en: What was that?
translation.ja: 今(いま)のは？

translation.en: - Nothing. - Thought I heard a splat.
translation.ja: なんでも しぶきの音(おと)が

translation.en: Uh, nope.  No splat. Definitely not. No.
translation.ja: まさか　しぶきの音(おと)なんて してない

translation.en: Are we done? Is the power back on?
translation.ja: 電気(でんき)はなおったか？

translation.en: Almost. We just need to pull these things 200 times,
translation.ja: もうすぐよ これを200回(かい)

translation.en: this thing 800 times, 50 sets of those, push this heavy button 1,000 times,
translation.ja: これを800回(かい) これを50セット これを1000回(かい)

translation.en: pull on these, tug on this, then trek 300 miles. But we have to do it together.
translation.ja: ひいて　さげて 480キロ歩(ある)く ふたりの力(ちから)でね

translation.en: Major?
translation.ja: 隊長(たいちょう)？

translation.en: Major? What's going on?
translation.ja: 隊長(たいちょう)　どうしたの？

translation.en: I'm not sweating.
translation.ja: 汗(あせ)はかかない

translation.en: What? The concert's starting soon and we still haven't got the power on.
translation.ja: コンサートが始(はじ)まるのに 電気(でんき)がなおってない

translation.en: All that gadgetry will take far too long.
translation.ja: 時間(じかん)がかかりすぎるし

translation.en: Besides, Flame and Tricks have it all under control.
translation.ja: フレイムとトリックに まかせればいい

translation.en: - Get in, Kit. -
translation.ja: のれ！

translation.en: Tonight's concert will feature all my best songs.
translation.ja: 今夜(こんや)はベスト曲(きょく)ばかり 歌(うた)うわよ

translation.en: Much better than last year, when I only played all my worst songs.
translation.ja: ワースト曲(きょく)ばかりだった 去年(きょねん)とはちがうわ

translation.en: Anyway, I better get ready. It's nearly showtime.
translation.ja: もうすぐ始(はじ)まるから 準備(じゅんび)しないと

translation.en: Tricks. Flame. Everything okay at the stadium?
translation.ja: トリックス　フレイム そっちはへいきか？

translation.en: Tell me everything's okay. All okay, isn't it?
translation.ja: へいきだと言(い)ってくれ

translation.en: OMG, it's brilliant!
translation.ja: すばらしいよ

translation.en: Best day ever! It's going so well! So well!
translation.ja: 最高(さいこう)の１日(にち)だ 最高(さいこう)！

translation.en: Excellent! So you've got the generator running.
translation.ja: いいぞ 発電機(はつでんき)が動(うご)いたんだな

translation.en: - Tricks couldn't start it! - Flame broke it!
translation.ja: トリックスが フレイムが

translation.en: It was my fault!
translation.ja: どうしよう

translation.en: Oh well. We could go back to the power station and--
translation.ja: それなら発電所(はつでんしょ)にもどって…

translation.en: It's no good. We'll have to cancel the concert. Cancel it.
translation.ja: ダメだ　コンサートは中止(ちゅうし)だ

translation.en: This is a disaster. No power, no way to find the power or power it.
translation.ja: 電気(でんき)もなければ かわりもないし

translation.en: No, there's just no possible way…
translation.ja: 電気(でんき)を… うみだす…

translation.en: to generate the power.
translation.ja: 方法(ほうほう)もない

translation.en: How about we use the exercise bike?
translation.ja: エアロバイクを使(つか)えば？

translation.en: Brilliant, Stripes. We can power the concert
translation.ja: そうだよ ペダルをこぎまくれば 電気(でんき)がつくれる

translation.en: by pedaling really hard for just a few hours.
translation.ja: ペダルをこぎまくれば 電気(でんき)がつくれる

translation.en: Like a really intense gym session.
translation.ja: ジムのセッションみたいに

translation.en: Yes. Let's build up a sweat and save the Lil JJ concert.
translation.ja: そうだ　汗(あせ)をかいて― リル･ＪＪの コンサートをすくおう！

translation.en: Anyone got any other ideas?
translation.ja: ほかのアイデアは？

translation.en: ♪ Music is my passion It's never out of fashion ♪
translation.ja: 音楽(おんがく)は わたしの情熱(じょうねつ) 　　 けっして色(いろ)あせない

translation.en: ♪ Pop songs are for everyone Even if they're really not ♪
translation.ja: ポップ･ソングは 　　　 みんなのもの たとえ ちがったとしても

translation.en: ♪ Like this one It goes on and on and on ♪
translation.ja: この曲(きょく)のように 　　ひたすらつづく

translation.en: ♪ Let's all dance together Come on ♪
translation.ja: みんなで 　　いっしょにおどろう

translation.en: ♪ I want to dance all night and forever ♪
translation.ja: えいえんに 　　おどりつづけよう

translation.en: ♪ I wanna get a sweat on And on and on and on ♪
translation.ja: 汗(あせ)をかきつづけたい

translation.en: Come on. The last song is nearly finished. Use every last bit of energy you have.
translation.ja: もうすぐおわるぞ エネルギーを使(つか)いはたせ

translation.en: Thank you, thank you!
translation.ja: みんな ありがとう

translation.en: It's been such a wonderful night, and you've been such a wonderful audience!
translation.ja: すばらしい夜(よる)に かんきゃくだったわ

translation.en: We did it, team.
translation.ja: みんな やったぞ！

translation.en: Let's all go home.
translation.ja: うちにかえろう

translation.en: My legs.
translation.ja: あしが

translation.en: I… I hate music.
translation.ja: 音楽(おんがく)はきらいだ

translation.en: And the show is not over yet, people. I'll now perform my new hit single!
translation.ja: まだおわってないわよ つぎは わたしの 最新(さいしん)のヒット曲(きょく)！

translation.en: - What? - Huh?
translation.ja: なんて？

translation.en: It's the new song.
translation.ja: 新曲(しんきょく)だ

translation.en: Huh? Another song?
translation.ja: もう１曲(きょく)？

translation.en: Okay, who's up for more cycling?
translation.ja: まだ こげる人？

translation.en: - Stripes? - I was before Kit.
translation.ja: ストライプス？ キットの前(まえ)にこいだ

translation.en: Is it Pecky's go?
translation.ja: ペッキーは？

translation.en: Ma… Maximum power.
translation.ja: マキシム･パワー

translation.en: We're losing power.
translation.ja: 電気(でんき)がなくなる

translation.en: Quick! Someone has to pedal.
translation.ja: だれかこいでくれ

translation.en: We can't. We've got no energy left.
translation.ja: ムリ　エネルギーが のこってない

translation.en: You're the only one who can pedal, Major.
translation.ja: 隊長(たいちょう)がこぐしかないわ

translation.en: But I can't.
translation.ja: できない

translation.en: Why not?
translation.ja: なぜ？

translation.en: Because
translation.ja: それは…

translation.en: I sweat, Kit. I sweat bad.
translation.ja: わたしは ものすごく 汗(あせ)をかくんだよ

translation.en: I mean, really bad.
translation.ja: ひどい汗(あせ)なんだ

translation.en: Every time the team exercises, I feel I have to hide away.
translation.ja: だからいつも かくれて エクササイズしてる

translation.en: ♪ Don't hide away That's what I say ♪
translation.ja: おねがいだから 　　　かくれないで

translation.en: But I sweat. I sweat a lot. Someone might laugh at me.
translation.ja: でも ものすごく 汗(あせ)をかくのに きっと笑(わら)われる

translation.en: ♪ Friends won't laugh It's okay ♪
translation.ja: 友達(ともだち)は笑(わら)ったりしない

translation.en: I should just do it.
translation.ja: やるしかない

translation.en: ♪ You need to show them Who you really are ♪
translation.ja: 本当(ほんとう)の自分(じぶん)を見(み)せて

translation.en: Show the real me.
translation.ja: 本当(ほんとう)のわたしを見(み)せる

translation.en: We failed!
translation.ja: 失敗(しっぱい)した

translation.en: The concert's ruined.
translation.ja: コンサートが台(だい)なしだ

translation.en: - Huh? - What?
translation.ja: なんだ？

translation.en: Stand back, everyone. This hedgehog's going to get a sweat on!
translation.ja: みんな さがれ ハリネズミが汗(あせ)をかくぞ

translation.en: Let's make this the best concert ever!
translation.ja: 最高(さいこう)のコンサートにしよう！

translation.en: ♪ Pick yourself up when you are blue ♪
translation.ja: おちこんだときも 　　　げんきをだして

translation.en: ♪ …turn on to me ♪
translation.ja: たのしくやろう

translation.en: ♪ Power up, power up, power up ♪
translation.ja: パワーアップ　パワーアップ

translation.en: Wow!
translation.ja: すごい！

translation.en: - Amazing! - Go, Major!
translation.ja: 隊長(たいちょう)！

translation.en: See, Major? You're not even sweating that mu-- Ugh!
translation.ja: ほらね　汗(あせ)なんて そんなに…

translation.en: - Where is it all coming from? - Gross!
translation.ja: なんだ これは

translation.en: You were right, Kit. There's no need to be embarrassed.
translation.ja: キットの言(い)うとおりだ はずかしがることはない

translation.en: Major, you're generating too much power!
translation.ja: 隊長(たいちょう)　電気(でんき)が強(つよ)すぎる

translation.en: I feel like a new hog! A hog who can sweat as much as he likes!
translation.ja: うまれかわった ハリネズミの気分(きぶん)だ！

translation.en: It's all going to collapse! We need to secure the stage!
translation.ja: あぶない ステージをまもって！

translation.en: Kit, water!
translation.ja: キット　水(みず)を！

translation.en: - Yes, Major. -
translation.ja: はい　隊長(たいちょう)

translation.en: I've been hiding my perspiration away all my life, and there was never a need to.
translation.ja: 今(いま)まで ずっと汗(あせ)を かくしてきたが必要(ひつよう)なかった

translation.en: - It's okay to sweat, isn't it? - Yep.
translation.ja: 汗(あせ)をかいてもいいんだな？ はい

translation.en: ♪ Don't be afraid to show the real you ♪
translation.ja: 本当(ほんとう)の自分(じぶん)を見(み)せるのを 　　　　　　　おそれないで

translation.en: - You did it, Major. -
translation.ja: やったわ　隊長(たいちょう)

translation.en: We all did it.
translation.ja: 全員(ぜんいん)の力(ちから)だ

translation.en: Let's hear it for Big Tree City Rescue!
translation.ja: ビッグツリー･シティー･ レスキューに拍手(はくしゅ)を

translation.en: When it came to saving the concert, they truly had the power.
translation.ja: みごとにコンサートを すくってくれました

translation.en: So, all the electricity is generated by that little machine of yours?
translation.ja: 電気(でんき)はすべて あのマシンが うみだしてるの？

translation.en: That's correct.
translation.ja: そうです

translation.en: So who's pedaling now?
translation.ja: 今(いま)こいでるのは？

translation.en: ♪ La, la, la La, la, la, la, let's go! ♪
translation.ja: 日本語字幕　金澤 葵
